import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Stats } from '../ui/Stats' import { ArrowSmDownIcon, ArrowSmUpIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const stats = [ { name: 'Total Subscribers', stat: '71,897', previousStat: '70,946', change: '12%', changeType: 'increase' }, { name: 'Avg. Open Rate', stat: '58.16%', previousStat: '56.14%', change: '2.02%', changeType: 'increase' }, { name: 'Avg. Click Rate', stat: '24.57%', previousStat: '28.62%', change: '4.05%', changeType: 'decrease' }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function CustomerList() { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/customer/') .then(({ data }) => setCustomers(data.data)) }, []) return (
{/* */} {customers.map((customer, customerIdx) => ( {/* */} ))}
Nombre Apellido Edad Edit
{customer.first_name} {customer.last_name} {customer.age} Edit
) }
